title: My game don't work.
body:
I am not from USA so i don't speak English good but i need help.
When my game starts it starts with a white screen the size of the normaly meniu of LoL. 
It says: Failed to load URL "https://riot:MVn00CAqjz-7oDPMjI7fTg@127.0.0.1:61822/index.html" with error "empty response" (-324).
Now i searched the link ,the problem,but nothing,usually i don't make nothing with other games i just stop playing if i see that i can't make nothing but i really need help,i play this game with my friend everyday and it's very fun so i'm not going to give up that easy. 


If you have some ideas that could work i will be more than happy.
Thank you.. :)

replies.body: This sounds like a connection problem failing to download assets or stay connected to our services.  My suggestion is to perform each instruction in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
